heading: Profile
description: Result-oriented web developer with over 3 years experience building pixel perfect websites, exceptional user experience, and scalable back end services. Built reusable UI with state management using component driven architecture to create robust and scalable single page applications, and developed self contained services for backend by implementing SOA (Service Oriented Architecture) principles.

repeatable.title: Web Developer
repeatable.text: A licensed medical device manufacturer, distributor and exporter of approved and cleared health information technology products.
listItems: Add features to legacy web application using ASP.Net web forms, AngularJS, Kendo UI, JavaScript and jQuery.
Build management and internal tools app using Angular, Angular Material, RxJS, NgRX, Docker, Angular Flex Layout and SCSS
Develop back end services using .Net Core, Rabbit MQ, Docker and MongoDB

repeatable.title: Web Developer
repeatable.text: A startup that provides IT solutions to professionals and enterprises.
listItems: Build front-end using JavaScript, jQuery, and AngularJS
Create responsive user interfaces using HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap
Develop back-end logic for websites, and Web APIs in PHP and Laravel
Write SQL commands and stored procedures in MySQL

listItems: Build UI with HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap

Develop back-end logic in PHP and design a relational database using MySQL

repeatable.title: Mobile Solutions Development
repeatable.text: Gained solid understanding of software design concepts. user interface design principles, computer and web application security, and usability testing

repeatable.text: Immersed in four years of learning technical and programming concepts in the development of software systems, and implemented the knowledge to build enterprise level software and web applications
